testcase.name: blog_posts_api_medium should create a published post
blog_posts_api_medium should create an unpublished post
blog_posts_api_medium should fetch all the posts
blog_posts_api_medium should fetch all the posts if the isPublished filter value does not exist
testcase.classname: should fetch all the posts if the isPublished filter value does not exist

testcase.name: blog_posts_api_medium should fetch all posts for an author
testcase.classname: should fetch all posts for an author

testcase.classname: should fetch no posts if author filter value does not exist

testcase.classname: should fetch all published posts for an author

testcase.classname: should fetch all unpublished posts for an author

testcase.name: blog_posts_api_medium should fetch a single post
blog_posts_api_medium should get 404 if the post ID does not exist
testcase.classname: should get 404 if the post ID does not exist
